User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Yatharth application.

registrationDate.description: Date and time when the user registered.

fcmTokens.description: An array of Firebase Cloud Messaging tokens for sending push notifications to the user's devices.

recommendedVideoUrl.description: URL of a recommended video for the user, pushed by an admin.

MeditationSession.title: MeditationSession
MeditationSession.description: Represents a single meditation session recorded for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the meditation session.

userId.description: Reference to the User who performed this session. (Relationship: User 1:N MeditationSession)

startTime.description: Date and time when the meditation session started.

endTime.description: Date and time when the meditation session ended.

duration.description: Duration of the meditation session in seconds.

DailyMeditationSummary.title: DailyMeditationSummary
DailyMeditationSummary.description: Represents a daily summary of meditation time for a user.

id.description: Unique identifier for the daily meditation summary.

userId.description: Reference to the User for whom this summary is generated. (Relationship: User 1:N DailyMeditationSummary)

date.description: The date for which the meditation time is summarized.

totalMeditationTime.description: Total meditation time in seconds for the user on the given date.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. Only the user themselves (or admin roles, implemented via separate collection) can access their own profile.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user, matching the Firebase Authentication UID.

definition.description: Stores meditation session data for a specific user.  Only the user themselves (or admin roles) can access their own sessions.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user who owns the meditation session.

params.name: sessionId
params.description: The unique ID of the meditation session.

definition.description: Stores daily meditation summaries for a specific user. Only the user themselves (or admin roles) can access their summaries.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique ID of the user who owns the meditation summary.

params.name: summaryId
params.description: The unique ID of the daily meditation summary.

firestore.reasoning:
The Firestore structure is designed to ensure data security, scalability, and ease of querying, especially for list operations, while adhering to the principle of Authorization Independence.  It leverages path-based ownership for user-specific data and avoids the use of `get()` calls in security rules by denormalizing necessary authorization data.

*   **Users Collection:** Stores user profiles.  Authorization is based on `request.auth.uid`.
*   **MeditationSessions Collection:** Stores individual meditation sessions. Located under `/users/{userId}/meditationSessions/{sessionId}` to represent the User 1:N MeditationSession relationship.  Security rules will enforce that only the authenticated user (`request.auth.uid`) matching the `userId` in the path can access these documents.
*   **DailyMeditationSummaries Collection:** Stores daily meditation summaries.  Located under `/users/{userId}/dailyMeditationSummaries/{summaryId}` to represent the User 1:N DailyMeditationSummary relationship. Security rules will enforce that only the authenticated user (`request.auth.uid`) matching the `userId` in the path can access these documents.

This design supports QAPs (Rules are not Filters) because list operations can be securely performed on the `meditationSessions` and `dailyMeditationSummaries` subcollections using path-based ownership without requiring any `get()` calls in the security rules.
